mapper.select: SELECT A.CD_COMPANY AS CD_COMPANY ,A.NO_EMP ,A.NM_KOR ,A.CD_DEPT ,B.NM_DEPT ,A.NO_TEL_EMER ,A.DT_BIRTH FROM MA_EMP A, MA_DEPT B WHERE A.CD_COMPANY = B.CD_COMPANY AND A.CD_DEPT = B.CD_DEPT AND A.CD_COMPANY = '10' AND A.CD_INCOM != '099' ORDER BY A.CD_DEPT

SELECT A.CD_COMPANY AS CD_COMPANY ,A.NO_EMP ,A.NM_KOR ,A.CD_DEPT ,B.NM_DEPT ,A.NO_TEL_EMER ,A.DT_BIRTH FROM MA_EMP A, MA_DEPT B WHERE A.CD_COMPANY = B.CD_COMPANY AND A.CD_DEPT = B.CD_DEPT AND A.CD_COMPANY = '10' AND A.NO_EMP = #{noEmp}
